description.zh-cn: 发生于明朝嘉靖三十四年的一场特大地震，是中国历史上破坏力最强的地震之一，也是世界有历史纪录的地震中死亡人数最多的地震，据记载造成约83万人死亡。
description.en: A catastrophic earthquake that occurred in the 34th year of the Jiajing reign of the Ming dynasty. It is one of the most destructive earthquakes in Chinese history and the deadliest earthquake on record, reportedly causing the deaths of approximately 830,000 people.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由汉族建立的大一统王朝。嘉靖大地震发生于该朝代统治期间。
description.en: A ruling dynasty of China established by the Han people. The Jiajing Great Earthquake occurred during this dynasty's rule.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，年号为嘉靖。嘉靖大地震因在其统治期间发生而得名。
description.en: The 12th Emperor of the Ming dynasty, whose era name was Jiajing. The Jiajing Great Earthquake is named after his reign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，曾任南京兵部尚书，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: An official of the Ming dynasty who served as the Minister of War in Nanjing. He died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，曾任南京光禄寺卿，在嘉靖大地震中与妻子一同遇难。
description.en: An official of the Ming dynasty who served as the Minister of the Court of Imperial Entertainments in Nanjing. He and his wife died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝郎中，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: A Bureau Director (Langzhong) of the Ming dynasty who died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝员外，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: A Bureau Vice Director (Yuanwai) of the Ming dynasty who died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝主事，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: A Section Chief (Zhushi) of the Ming dynasty who died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝进士，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: A Jinshi degree holder of the Ming dynasty who died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝御史，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: An Investigating Censor (Yushi) of the Ming dynasty who died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，曾任南京国子监祭酒，在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: An official of the Ming dynasty who served as the Chancellor of the National University in Nanjing. He died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 位于陕西省西安市的唐代佛塔，在嘉靖大地震中受损。
description.en: A Buddhist pagoda from the Tang dynasty located in Xi'an, Shaanxi, which was damaged during the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 唐高宗李治与武则天的合葬陵墓，其陵园在嘉靖大地震中被完全毁掉。
description.en: The joint tomb of Emperor Gaozong of Tang and his wife Wu Zetian. Its mausoleum park was completely destroyed in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 黄河的最大支流。嘉靖大地震导致其河道向北移动了约五公里。
description.en: The largest tributary of the Yellow River. The Jiajing Great Earthquake caused its course to shift about five kilometers northward.

description.zh-cn: 中国的第二长河。在嘉靖大地震期间因山体滑坡堵塞而出现逆流和河水澄清的现象。
description.en: The second-longest river in China. During the Jiajing Great Earthquake, landslides caused it to be blocked, leading to backflow and the phenomenon of its water becoming clear.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，时任户部左侍郎，在嘉靖大地震后被朝廷派往灾区赈灾。
description.en: An official of the Ming dynasty serving as the Left Vice Minister of Revenue, who was dispatched by the imperial court to the disaster area for relief efforts after the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官署，掌管全国财政事宜。嘉靖大地震后，其官员邹守愚被派往赈灾。
description.en: An ancient Chinese government agency in charge of national financial affairs. After the Jiajing Great Earthquake, its official Zou Shouyu was dispatched for disaster relief.

zh-cn: 陕西等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。在明朝时是嘉靖大地震的震中和重灾区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China. During the Ming dynasty, it was the epicenter and most heavily affected area of the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

zh-cn: 山西等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。在明朝时是嘉靖大地震的受灾区域之一。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China. During the Ming dynasty, it was one of the areas affected by the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

zh-cn: 河南等处承宣布政使司

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。在明朝时是嘉靖大地震的受灾区域之一。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China. During the Ming dynasty, it was one of the areas affected by the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝人物，作为嘉靖大地震的亲历者，留下了关于地震的详细文字记录。
description.en: A figure from the Ming dynasty who, as an eyewitness to the Jiajing Great Earthquake, left detailed written records of the event.

description.zh-cn: 明朝《露书》作者，亲身经历了嘉靖大地震后的地理变化并将其记录下来。
description.en: The author of 'Lu Shu' from the Ming dynasty, who personally experienced and recorded the geographical changes following the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 时任前南京兵部尚书的韩邦奇在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Han Bangqi, the former Minister of War in Nanjing, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 时任南京光禄寺卿的马理在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Ma Li, the Minister of the Court of Imperial Entertainments in Nanjing, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝郎中薛祖学在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Xue Zuxue, a Bureau Director of the Ming dynasty, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝员外贺承光在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: He Chengguang, a Bureau Vice Director of the Ming dynasty, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝主事王尚礼在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Wang Shangli, a Section Chief of the Ming dynasty, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝进士白大用在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Bai Dayong, a Jinshi degree holder of the Ming dynasty, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 明朝御史杨九泽在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Yang Jiuze, an Investigating Censor of the Ming dynasty, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 时任南京国子监祭酒的王维桢在嘉靖大地震中遇难。
description.en: Wang Weizhen, the Chancellor of the National University in Nanjing, died in the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 地震导致小雁塔塔身被震裂，从十五层减少为十三层。
description.en: The earthquake caused the Small Wild Goose Pagoda's body to crack, reducing its height from fifteen to thirteen stories.

description.zh-cn: 地震导致唐乾陵陵园被完全毁掉。
description.en: The earthquake led to the complete destruction of the Qianling Mausoleum park.

description.zh-cn: 地震造成巨大人员伤亡与财产损失，明朝从国库调拨大量资金用于救灾，导致国库连续两年亏空，对国力和财政状况造成了负面影响。
description.en: The earthquake caused massive casualties and property losses. The Ming dynasty allocated large sums from the state treasury for disaster relief, leading to a deficit for two consecutive years and negatively impacting the state's power and financial situation.

description.zh-cn: 地震导致渭河改道，向北移动了大约五公里。
description.en: The earthquake caused the Wei River to change its course, shifting it northward by about five kilometers.

description.zh-cn: 地震引发的滑坡堵塞了黄河，导致河水逆流，并出现了河水澄清三日的现象。
description.en: Landslides triggered by the earthquake blocked the Yellow River, causing it to flow backward and its water to become clear for three days.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省是嘉靖大地震的震中所在地及受灾最严重的地区。
description.en: Shaanxi Province was the location of the epicenter and the most severely affected area of the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 山西省是嘉靖大地震的受灾区之一。
description.en: Shanxi Province was one of the areas affected by the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 河南省是嘉靖大地震的受灾区之一。
description.en: Henan Province was one of the areas affected by the Jiajing Great Earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 秦可大亲身经历了此次地震，并留下了详细的文字记载，成为研究该事件的重要史料。
description.en: Qin Keda personally experienced the earthquake and left detailed written records, which have become important historical sources for studying the event.

description.zh-cn: 姚旅亲身经历了地震后的地理变化，如地下水位下降和地气变暖，并将其记录在《露书》中。
description.en: Yao Lü personally experienced the geographical changes after the earthquake, such as the drop in the water table and ground temperature rise, and recorded them in his book 'Lu Shu'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗朱厚熜是明朝的第十二位皇帝。
description.en: The Jiajing Emperor Zhu Houcong was the 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 地震因发生于其在位期间（嘉靖年号）而通常被称为“嘉靖大地震”。
description.en: The earthquake is commonly named the 'Jiajing Great Earthquake' because it occurred during his reign (the Jiajing era).

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖三十五年二月，明朝朝廷派遣时任户部左侍郎的邹守愚抵达灾区进行赈灾。
description.en: In the second month of the 35th year of Jiajing (1556), the Ming imperial court dispatched Zou Shouyu, then the Left Vice Minister of Revenue, to the disaster area to carry out relief efforts.

description.zh-cn: 在奉命赈灾时，邹守愚担任户部左侍郎。
description.en: When ordered to conduct disaster relief, Zou Shouyu served as the Left Vice Minister of the Ministry of Revenue.
